title: 20 min Leavebuster
body: Not really impressed, had to take 2 calls so never really left the game for longer than 3 -4 mins per call , played to the end to secure win, my punishment ?  20 min wait per game for next 5 games, do I wanta wait what twiddling my thumbs for 20 mins , I think not , think u've lost an avid player guys , I don't mind 5 mins or less but 20 mins , LOL forget it ;(

replies.body: Actually I dont mind ppl going afk here an there, against Bots it dosen't matter, thats life, my beef is a 20 min ban per game , where really 5 mins is punishment enough you'd think, its a game to be enjoyed by all well thats what I used to believe
dude well deserved i know u cant help phone calls but if theres one thing i hate its afk

Hey,
It sucks that you have to endure that kind of punishment, but it's compensation for all those teammates that had to deal with an afk. In the future think about their feelings and try to reserve time for League, the games can get pretty long so if you don't have a lot of time or you know you'll need to multi task, play aram or even custom matches. This punishment is harsh but if it was light, everyone would leave their game because "why not".
